title: Walmart 4th of July sale 2021: huge deals on grills, furniture, appliances, more
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Walmart's huge 4th of July sale is live - see today's top deals
article: The Walmart 4th of July sales event is in full swing, with hundreds of great deals up for grabs, including furniture, TVs, mattresses, laptops, AirPods, grills, and more. To help you find the very best bargains, we're rounding up the best deals from Walmart's 4th of July sale just below.

The 4th of July marks the middle of summer, which means it's a fantastic opportunity to score massive discounts on outdoor items like grills, patio furniture, and outdoor fun like pools, trampolines, and toys. Walmart's 4th of July sale also includes deals on tech items such as 4K TVs, laptops, and headphones, and if you're looking to save on items for the home, you can find bargains on furniture, mattresses, kitchen appliances, and vacuums. You'll find all the links to Walmart's most popular 4th of July sale categories, followed by the stand-out deals, including AirPods, grills, 4K TVs, robot vacuums, and more. Keep in mind that most of today's offers end tomorrow, and check out our main 4th of July sales roundup for more offers from retailers like Best Buy, Home Depot, and Lowes.

You can see more offers with our roundup of the best 4th of July mattress sales from brands like Nectar, Purple, and Tempur-Pedic. You can also see more tech deals with our guide to the best 4th of July TV sales and the top 4th of July laptop sales.
